content: Hello there, Jeyachandran! Nice to meet you. Thanks for coming in today. Can you start by telling me a bit about yourself and why you're interested in this Software Engineer position at OneDirect?
i am b.tect aiml in kec

So you have a background in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from Kongu Engineering College (KEC). That's fantastic! Can you walk me through some of your key projects or achievements from your academic days that demonstrate your skills in AI and ML?
do want ask any other question

Not yet! I'd like to get a better sense of your practical experience in the industry. Can you tell me about your experience as a Web Developer at Fabromant and Centillion Labs? What were some of the most challenging tasks you faced, and how did you overcome them?
